visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing logarithmic-scale data with negative values using Highcharts' logarithmic axis customization

title.text: Logarithmic Axis with Custom Conversion Allows Negative Values

visualization_explanation: The visualization uses a univariate dataset with 11 numerical values spanning 12 temporal categories (months). Synthetic data follows an exponential progression from -1000 to +1000, maintaining symmetry across zero. The spline chart was chosen to emphasize continuous magnitude changes while logarithmic scaling preserves resolution across 7 orders of magnitude. Cairo's principles are applied through teal-blue coloring for pre-attentive processing and axis label legibility (14px sans-serif). The synthetic data exhibits dual statistical properties: exponential distribution (log-spaced values) and central clustering near zero (6 values within ±1). Custom axis configuration overcomes default logarithmic limitations through sign-preserving transformation logic.
